meanings.definition: To surpass or exceed in importance or power.
meanings.sent1: In the race, the cheetah outtrumps all other animals with its incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: She outtrumps her classmates in math by always getting the highest scores.
meanings.sent3: The little ant outtrumps the big elephant in carrying heavy loads.
meanings.sent4: His determination outtrumps any obstacles that come his way.
meanings.sent5: The sun outtrumps the moon in brightness, lighting up the sky during the day.

meanings.definition: To defeat or outdo someone or something in a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The champion boxer outtrumps his opponent with a knockout punch.
meanings.sent2: She outtrumps her siblings in every game they play together.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox outtrumps the hunter by outsmarting his traps.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outtrumps any mean words thrown her way.
meanings.sent5: The superhero outtrumps the villain with his incredible powers.
